thread.title: Kendrick Lamar is Working With Rich The Kid
thread.title_full: Kendrick Lamar is Working With Rich The Kid

author: Hypebeast (info@hypebeast.com)
title: Kendrick Lamar is Working With Rich The Kid
text:
It looks like a Top Dawg Entertainment and Quality Control collaboration is on its way. As revealed through social media earlier today, Rich The Kid and Kendrick Lamar have been cooking up some music together. Via an Instagram post from Rich The Kid himself and some brief clips floating around Twitter, the pair's in-studio encounter was confirmed and pushed as "legendary." While only a snippet of Rich The Kid's bars have surfaced, rest assured that Kendrick Lamar will come with some heat. If these two are working together, maybe we'll get a Migos record with another member of the TDE family. You can check out Rich The Kid's Instagram picture with Kendrick Lamar and a clip of an unreleased track below.
Blessed to work wit Kendrick Lamar lastnite legendary way .. yea dat way #itsontheway #forthebirds #boiyallintrouble 
A photo posted by Rich The Kid (@richthekid) on Jan 11, 2017 at 11:17am PST 

Kendrick Lamar & Rich The Kid in the studio pic.twitter.com/K3NhTEfPK8
